pullRequest.title: [FLINK-18912][python][docs] Add Python api tutorial under Python GettingStart
pullRequest.bodyText:
What is the purpose of the change
This pull request adds Python api tutorial under Python GettingStart. The tutorial that tells users how to set up a Python project, how to write jobs and how to run jobs locally.
Brief change log

Move Try Flink tutorial under Python GettingStart.
Add pointers in the original document page.

Verifying this change
This change is a trivial rework / code cleanup without any test coverage.
Does this pull request potentially affect one of the following parts:

Dependencies (does it add or upgrade a dependency): (no)
The public API, i.e., is any changed class annotated with @Public(Evolving): (no)
The serializers: (no)
The runtime per-record code paths (performance sensitive): (no)
Anything that affects deployment or recovery: JobManager (and its components), Checkpointing, Kubernetes/Yarn/Mesos, ZooKeeper: (no)
The S3 file system connector: (no)

Documentation

Does this pull request introduce a new feature? (no)

commit.message: [FLINK-18912][python][docs] Add Python api tutorial under Python GettingStart

nodes.bodyText: If you're moving the content, please just delete this page and setup a redirect.
